summary: The Girl and Death tells us the impossible love story of Nicolai and the courtesan Elise. A love obstructed by materialism, wealth and death threat.
cast: Sylvia Hoeks|Dieter Hallervorden|Renata Litvinova|Svetlana Svetlichnaya|Sergey Makovetskiy|Leonid Bichevin|Henri Garcin|Dmitry Brauer|Maxim Kovalevski|Paul Schlase|Friederike Frerichs|Jim van der Woude|Ulrich Ansch√ºtz|Eva-Maria Kurz|Elsa Brauer|Roman Kohnle|Elisey Brauer|Matthias Hummitzsch|Barbara Wittman|Joost Spijkers|Stefan Linke
title: Het Meisje en de Dood
